title: Invoke cross account cross region Lambda function via Encryped SNS
description: Create a SNS trigger which invokes cross account cross region Lambda function

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample pattern allows users from one account to publish meesages to their Lambda function present in a different account via SNS.
This is highly efficient and useful when it comes to sending encrypted messages to cross account Lambda function for further processing.

bullets.text: Tutorial - How to invoke a Lambda function from SNS

text: See the Github repo for detailed testing instructions.
